query:
ALTER TABLE notification_preferences 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS enable_email_digest BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS digest_frequency ENUM('daily', 'weekly') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'daily',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS digest_delivery_time INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 9,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS digest_day_of_week INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS last_digest_sent_at TIMESTAMP NULL;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3HwZw1vuDqLodBY.root --database hjcHA4SjAwhM6aP28vcAkH --execute ALTER TABLE notification_preferences 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS enable_email_digest BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS digest_frequency ENUM('daily', 'weekly') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'daily',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS digest_delivery_time INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 9,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS digest_day_of_week INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS last_digest_sent_at TIMESTAMP NULL;
